verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:25
verses.text: Therefore the Lord hath recompensed me according to my righteousness; according to my cleanness in his eye sight.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:26
verses.text: With the merciful thou wilt shew thyself merciful, and with the upright man thou wilt shew thyself upright.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:27
verses.text: With the pure thou wilt shew thyself pure; and with the froward thou wilt shew thyself unsavoury.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:28
verses.text: And the afflicted people thou wilt save: but thine eyes are upon the haughty, that thou mayest bring them down.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:29
verses.text: For thou art my lamp, O Lord: and the Lord will lighten my darkness.
